caption: Figure 1: Optimal Approach for Multi-Draft Speculative Sampling
description: The figure illustrates the optimal two-step approach for multi-draft speculative sampling, which involves importance weighted sampling followed by speculative sampling.

caption: Figure 2: Numerical evaluation of Pr(accept) for the optimal scheme (Theorem 3) as well as two baseline schemes – SpecTr (Sun et al., 2024b) and SpecInfer (Miao et al., 2024).
